noUselessSwitchCase.description:
Description

Disallow uselesscaseinswitchstatements.
Aswitchstatement can optionally have adefaultclause.
Thedefaultclause will be still executed only if there is no match in thecaseclauses.
An emptycaseclause that precedes thedefaultclause is thus useless.
noUselessSwitchCase.option: This rule has no specific options.
